#summary The small and dirty multimedia player for the geeks
#labels Featured,Phase-Design

= Introduction =

The first version includes support for basic gstreamer stuff. You can control the stream using arrow-keys, toggle fullscreen with f, toggle textoverlay with t, press pause with space and stop stream with enter. To start playing the stream you will have to drag-and-drop a file into it.


= Details =
Next version v0.2 will include:
  * Playlist
  * More detailed status information in textoverlay
